Blogs are mostly static websites that are meant to share information among people with common interests. Most blog authors do not want to focus on writing blog posts and do not want to spend a lot of time with technical details of how the blog-sites are published. Hence tools that support blog authors in setting up their posts are very important. 

### Available Tools
There are many tools available that help authors setting up their blog-site. Most blogging sites like WordPress offer their own authoring tools. Those are certainly great when you want to write some ordinary test.
